title: stuck in authentication
body:
I was playing today and I've got a lot of attempting to reconnect then I turned my internet connection off after that when I turn it on and tried to log in it stuck in authentication please help me I didn't find any solution for it on internet
also I figured out when I use vpn it will logging in

replies.body: If a VPN is working then your network's routing might be reaching blocks before reaching the authentication server.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, especially focusing on configuring your DNS.  Hope that helps!
